pr_title: SAK-34123 - Hardcoded "None of the Above" in English test

timeline.message: SAK-34123 - Hardcoded "None of the Above" in English test

timeline.bodyText: These are both null. You just set them to null! I don't understand!
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Can never be too sure in Java! :) I plan to resolve the conflicts and can look at why I might have done this.
replies.author: jonespm

timeline.bodyText: May as well use StringUtils.isEmpty here.
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: This wasn't even code I changed, but I can update it!
replies.author: jonespm

replies.bodyText: It's also possible that isBlank could cause a regression here since it isn't the same behavior but probably unlikely.
replies.author: jonespm

timeline.message:
Updates based on code review:

Removing unneeded check
Using StringUtils.isBlank
